eshmun.modelrepair.unsat

Class UnsatCoreSolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • eshmun.modelrepair.sat.AbstractSatSolver
      • eshmun.modelrepair.unsat.UnsatCoreSolver

  • public class UnsatCoreSolver
extends AbstractSatSolver
    This is the interface for the sat4j sat solver that is a java implementation for satisfiability problem.
    Since:
    0.1
    Author:
    Kinan Dak Al Bab

    • Constructor Detail

      • UnsatCoreSolver

        public UnsatCoreSolver(AbstractExpression cnfExpression,
                       java.lang.String musPath)
                throws NotCNFException,
                       java.io.IOException
        Create a new MINIMAL-UNSAT-CORE solver for the given problem.
        Parameters:
        cnfExpression - the expression to find UNSAT CORE for.
        musPath - the path for the minimal UNSAT-Core tool.
        Throws:
        NotCNFException - if the expression is not in CNF format.
        java.io.IOException - if an error while reading problem occurred.

    • Method Detail

                      throws java.io.IOException
        Determines whether the given expression is satisfiable or not using SAT4J solver.
        Specified by:
        isSatisfiable in class AbstractSatSolver
        Returns:
        true if it is satisfiable, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if something wrong happened while reading files.
